page.title: 13OTHER OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Many of the occupations in the area are involved in the service of farming and tourism. The three garages, whilst supplying petrol and maintenance for domestic vehicles play a large part in the supply and maintenance of farm machinery and equipment. Several jobbing builders and joiners thrive in the area, as does a larger building company with premises in the disused Askrigg Station and a government-sponsored advanced factory unit. Close by is a feed merchant. With the advent of tourism, the catering business has flourished from the establishment of private hotels and restaurants to domestic bed and breakfast accommodation, providing a great deal of part-time and seasonal employment. There is also a thriving artistic community.
